summary: "Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.
cast: Gene Hackman|Fernando Rey|Bernard Fresson|Philippe Léotard|Ed Lauter|Charles Millot|Jean-Pierre Castaldi|Cathleen Nesbitt|Samantha Llorens|André Penvern|Reine Prat|Raoul Delfosse|Luang Ham Chau|Jacques Dynam|Malek Kateb|Pierre Collet|Alexandre Fabre|Jean-Pierre Zola|Manu Pluton|Daniel Vérité|Jean-Marc Allègre|Roland Blanche|Patrick Bouchitey|Philippe Brizard|Paul Mercey|Hal Needham|Ambroise Perrin
keywords: organized crime|drug traffic|detective|sequel to best picture winner|american abroad
title: French Connection II
